system.description: Holy/blessed ammunition. Negates Regeneration trait on warp-touched entities for 1 round per hit. Extremely Rare on Barovus. Must be blessed by a sanctioned Ministorum priest.
Silver-tipped rounds effective against Warp-Mutants (+2 damage, causes pain â€” WP test or disengage). Requires Trade (Armourer) to manufacture from silver sources.
Ammunition reloaded via Trade (Armourer). 10% chance per round of jamming (96-00 on attack roll, weapon jams as Unreliable). Produced at 2d10 rounds per hour of work.

Sacred oils from the Fallen Astartes Outpost. Each application grants the Sanctified quality to one melee weapon for 24 hours. 3 applications available (one-time reward for passing the Trial of Faith).
